Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
LSD \LSD\ n. lysergic acid diethylamide, a powerful hallucinogenic drug. [Acronym]
Syn: lysergic acid diethylamide, acid. [WordNet 1.5]
LSD n : a powerful hallucinogenic drug manufactured from lysergic acid [syn: {lysergic acid diethylamide}]
